content: {"name": "Catholic Charities of Wayne County and Detroit Michigan", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Various emergency assistance programs are offered. There is a free pantry for meat, dairy, and food items. A thrift store is open and a soup kitchen serves hot meals. There are also free personal hygiene and cleaning supplies, including detergent, soap, shampoo, and other items. They have free groceries and meals for the unemployed, immigrants and others in Detroit MI.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.needhelppayingbills.com/html/detroit_food_banks.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "25250 Eureka Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Taylor", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48180", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.1979994, "longitude": -83.28147709999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(734) 946-4002", "type": "voice"}]}
